General.Name: Anhui Coreach Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Anhui Coreach Technology Co.,Ltd engages in the research and development, production, and sale of display photoelectric systems and health intelligent light source systems. It offers backlight products; household, commercial, and educational lighting products; and backlight, lighting, and special LED products. The company was founded in 2012 and is headquartered in Hefei, China.
General.Address: Xinruida Science and Technology Park, Hefei, China, 230000
